inclusion.criterion: Histologically confirmed diagnosis of diffuse large B-cell lymphoma
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Relapsed or refractory after at least 1 prior systemic treatment for aggressive lymphoma
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Measurable disease as specified in study protocol
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group (ECOG) performance status of 0 to 2
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Female patients who are post menopausal for at least 1 year, surgically sterile, or agree to practice 2 effective methods of contraception through 30 days after the last dose of alisertib (MLN8237) or agree to abstain from heterosexual intercourse
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Male patients who agree to practice effective barrier contraception through 4 months after the last dose of MLN8237 or agree to abstain from heterosexual intercourse
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Received more than 4 prior systemic treatment regimens for lymphoma
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Known human immunodeficiency virus (HIV) positive or acquired immunodeficiency syndrome (AIDS)-related illness; hepatitis B virus, or hepatitis C virus;
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Autologous stem cell transplant less than 3 months prior to enrollment
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has a history of Burkitt's lymphoma, which is a type of aggressive lymphoma. However, they have also received more than 4 prior systemic treatment regimens for lymphoma, which makes them ineligible for the trial.
